SWR_001.description: The system shall monitor vehicle speed and detect when it exceeds a threshold for more than 5 seconds.

SWR_002.description: The system shall issue a warning to the driver when prolonged overspeeding is detected.

SWR_003.description: The system shall automatically trigger a mild brake command if overspeeding continues beyond 10 seconds.

SWR_004.description: The system shall log speed violations and the duration for each occurrence.

SWR_005.description: The system shall display visual cues when braking is triggered due to speed violation.
